Title: S6 Ep. 254 Marc Adams: Coaching And Caring
Description: Marc Adams is the owner of Next Level Business Advisors - an accounting and coaching business that serves his customers with a heart of caring. He also is the host of Business SOS podcast.   One of the words that Marc shared to describe him is #caring.  He takes time to understand his clients needs and the results they want to see in their business. He also understands that being a #business #coach is not transactional, rather it is about a relationship which stems from caring for people. We hope you enjoy this week’s episode of The Intern Whisperer on Podbean.   The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #Skills based #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
